body.name: FUFU&GAGA Buffet Cabinet Storage Kitchen Sideboard Farmhouse Buffet Server Bar Wine Cabinet with 5 Drawers & 4 Doors, Console Table for Dining Living Room Cupboard (Grey)
body.stockDetail: Only 17 left in stock - order soon.
features: 【Classic Design】The attractive and sleek pattern on the doors, classic appearance and great storage organization made this large sideboard buffet cabinet.The smooth stream-lined design drawers bring modern and classic for your living space and suits perfectly for your home decor

【Multifunction】This credenza would exactly meet your storage needs in your kitchen or pantry. Features 5 drawers, which provides enough storage to store spoons, knives, towels and so on. The bottom cabinets with 4 doors offer 4 storage shelves to store bowls, plates, containers, etc. The wide 59.1 inch wooden top allows you to put blender, microwave and coffee machine on it

【High Quality】The sideboards and buffets with storage is mainly made of thick MDF board. The mid-century style wooden legs can hold the entire weight effortlessly, which is enough for daily use and ensures stability at the same time. The spraying surface has the characteristics of polish, wear-resistant and waterproof, which prolongs using life.

【Perfect for Your Home】The credenza sideboard buffet is suitable for most of the themes. You can treat it as a console table in living room, a sideboard in the hallway, coffee bar cabinet, kitchen storage cabinet and wherever you like. Overall Dimension: (59.1”W x 15.7”D x 33.5”H)

【Customer Service】This item is divided into a large number of pieces to make sure the stability. Please be patient when you assemble it. Every piece is labeled and all hardwares are included with instructions. We are committed to supporting high quality furniture and providing the best customer service. If you have any questions, please contact us and provide evidence if there is anything wrong with the item. You'll get satisfactory solution, when I verify it.
body.description: FUFU&GAGA Buffet Sideboard Storage Kitchen Cabinet with 5 Drawers & 4 Doors, Your Perfect Option! Are you looking for a set of stylish storage buffet cabinet to highlight the modern ambience in your home? FUFU&GAGA buffet cabinet will look stunning in your home, the cabinet will totally exceed your expectations! Overall Dimension: 59.1"W x 15.7"D x 33.5"H Weight Capacity: The top hold 200lbs, the inner shelves hold 60lbs, the drawers hold 40bls. Color: White / Black /GreyMaterial: MDF

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for a TV stand or under a wall mounted TV. Good materials, looks great!
reviews.reviewText: We're using this buffet under our wall mounted TV and it looks great, highly recommend.The grey model looks exactly as pictured, very happy with the overall design. The materials certainly aren't extremely high quality, but certainly better than you'd find at most big box stores. According to the product description the top is wood and the other parts are HDF (much better than MDF - medium density fiber board).The only thing I didn't lock are the used of cam connectors for the bigger pieces, they don't give me the feeling of reliability. Also, the dowels are very loose, they more-so function for indexes the parts to match up correctly than to actually enhance the structural integrity. All that being said, if you're handy you could easily make this into a solid piece of furniture by getting bigger dowels and gluing them and I'm sure small high quality screws in the right places would really help.To be clear, it's solid as of the day it was built, but with 2 wild kids, I'm sure they'll find some way to break it eventually.It takes about 3 hours to assemble if you're hand screwing, but if you're careful with an impact driver you might be ok. DO NOT use the impact driver on the cabinet door knobs, the threaded on the knob side is good but not great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is absolutely beautiful, just like pictured. Very sturdy except for the drawers, which could have a little more support to hold in place but don't think they will fall out or anything. Had a friend's 16-year old put together for me. He said was easy to assemble. Heavy when arrived. Took two men to get into the house. Absolutely love it! Would highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Item was damaged unable to get refund without paying for full shipping costs. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy construction, lots of pieces clearly labeled and very thorough, clearly written instructions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars 4 stars- pretty good but could improve
reviews.reviewText: There are pretty detailed instructions for an Amazon furniture purchase. It did need a couple holes fixed or drilled in a little more.There are gaps between the doors that is a little frustrating and the top drawers feel a little flimsy.That being said, for the price it is a stunning piece of furniture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It does look nice, but it came with a crack on the top piece and would like a replacement. I just can’t get a hold of anyone to tell them. The number that you are to call for help has been disconnected and I’ve got nothing from the email address they gave either.

reviews.reviewText: Amazing piece for a good price 👌
